hints.title: Main Theorem (Informal)
hints.content:
262: :label: thm-main-informal
263: 
264: The Geometric Gas with uniformly elliptic anisotropic diffusion is geometrically ergodic on its state space $\mathcal{X} \times \mathbb{R}^d$. There exists a unique quasi-stationary distribution (QSD) $\pi_{\text{QSD}}$, and the Markov chain converges exponentially fast:
265: 
266: $$
267: \left\| \mathcal{L}(S_t \mid S_0) - \pi_{\text{QSD}} \right\|_{\text{TV}} \le C_\pi (1 + V_{\text{total}}(S_0)) e^{-\kappa_{\text{total}} t}
268: $$
269: 
270: where:
271: - $\kappa_{\text{total}} = O(\min\{\gamma \tau, \kappa_x^{\text{clone}}, c_{\min}\underline{\lambda} - C_1 L_\Sigma - C_2|\nabla\Sigma_{\text{reg}}|_\infty\}) > 0$
272: - All constants are **independent of $N$**
273: - $c_{\min}$ is the ellipticity lower bound from regularization

259: ### 2.5. Main Result (Informal)
260: 
261: :::{prf:theorem} Main Theorem (Informal)
262: :label: thm-main-informal
263: 
264: The Geometric Gas with uniformly elliptic anisotropic diffusion is geometrically ergodic on its state space $\mathcal{X} \times \mathbb{R}^d$. There exists a unique quasi-stationary distribution (QSD) $\pi_{\text{QSD}}$, and the Markov chain converges exponentially fast:
265: 
266: $$
267: \left\| \mathcal{L}(S_t \mid S_0) - \pi_{\text{QSD}} \right\|_{\text{TV}} \le C_\pi (1 + V_{\text{total}}(S_0)) e^{-\kappa_{\text{total}} t}
268: $$
269: 
270: where:
271: - $\kappa_{\text{total}} = O(\min\{\gamma \tau, \kappa_x^{\text{clone}}, c_{\min}\underline{\lambda} - C_1 L_\Sigma - C_2|\nabla\Sigma_{\text{reg}}|_\infty\}) > 0$
272: - All constants are **independent of $N$**
273: - $c_{\min}$ is the ellipticity lower bound from regularization
274: - $L_\Sigma$ is the Lipschitz constant of $\Sigma_{\text{reg}}$
